content.prompt: Which of the following variables for data about a track team is a discrete variable?

choices.label: The height of a team member
The weight of a team member
The number of times that a team member finished first in a race
The time recorded for the last race that was run by a team member
The time recorded for a one-mile race by a team member

topic.text: 1.5: Representing a Quantitative Variable with Graphs

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
